definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Just as terrorists have taken advantage of the openness of our society to carry out their plots, violent extremists use the internet to radicalize and intimidate.
sentences.chinese: 暴力极端分子利用互联网来实现极端激进和威胁恐吓。

sentences.english: He didn't say whether he believed the militants were homegrown or foreign-based.
sentences.chinese: 他没有说明他认为极端分子是来自国内还是国外。

sentences.english: Today's teachers are not the ranging extremists of TORY and tabloid mythology.
sentences.chinese: 今天的老师不属于托利时代的极端分子和小报的神话。

sentences.english: The Islamic extremists seized Palmyra three months ago.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰国极端分子三个月前占领了帕尔米拉古城。

sentences.english: So it may be tempting to think of them off-kilter extremists at the edge of society.
sentences.chinese: 他们很容易让人想起那些生活在社会边缘的极端分子。
对抗伊朗的俾路支极端分子。

sentences.english: The Swat Valley was under the control of Taliban extremists for more than three years.
sentences.chinese: 塔利班极端分子对斯瓦特山谷地区的控制已有三年多。

sentences.english: He says the extremist cleric is on the run and keeps changing his locations.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这名在逃的极端分子教士不断改变他的藏身地。

sentences.english: The only suspects were a bunch of extremists called Sapien Sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的嫌犯是一群叫做“贤知阳升”的极端分子。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
